TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ComponentCallbacks2 extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Extended interface with a new callback for finer-grained memory management.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.TrimMemory TrimMemoryBackground = (40)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.TrimMemory enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: Level for : the process has gone on to the LRU list.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.TrimMemory TrimMemoryComplete = (80)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.TrimMemory enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: Level for : the process is nearing the end of the background LRU list, and if more memory isn't found soon it will be killed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.TrimMemory TrimMemoryModerate = (60)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.TrimMemory enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: Level for : the process is around the middle of the background LRU list; freeing memory can help the system keep other processes running later in the list for better overall performance.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.TrimMemory TrimMemoryRunningCritical = (15)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.TrimMemory enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: Level for : the process is not an expendable background process, but the device is running extremely low on memory and is about to not be able to keep any background processes running.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.TrimMemory TrimMemoryRunningLow = (10)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.TrimMemory enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: Level for : the process is not an expendable background process, but the device is running low on memory.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.TrimMemory TrimMemoryRunningModerate = (5)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.TrimMemory enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: Level for : the process is not an expendable background process, but the device is running moderately low on memory.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.TrimMemory TrimMemoryUiHidden = (20)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.TrimMemory enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: Level for : the process had been showing a user interface, and is no longer doing so.
